page.title: 14My Dad Commutes - My Day
page.content: At 7.30am my dad wakes me with my breakfast.He then leaves in his car to travel to Leicester where he works as a systems manager. My mum makes sure I am dressed before she leaves in her car to travel to Colsterworth in Lincolnshire where she teaches.My elder sister and brother are next to leave to catch their bus to their secondary schools in Melton Mowbray. I am last to leave at 8.30am because my primary school is in the village. I am first home just after 3.30pm, quickly followed by my sister and brother.My mum gets our tea when she gets home at 5.00pm.My dad gets home at 6.30pm and his tea is usually cold. I usually play out with my friends in the village till it goes dark and then I watch the TV till my mum tells me to go to bed.
